title: Bug 116786: Library includes should store relative paths
OB: The BIRT designer does not generate or save relative paths when including a library in a report design. When including a library from a different location, the path is saved as an absolute path.
EB: The BIRT designer should generate and save relative paths when including libraries in a report design. This means that when a library is included from a different location, the path should be saved as a relative path instead of an absolute path.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a report design in the BIRT designer.
2. Include a library from a different location, such as '$project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary'.
3. Save the report design.
4. Close and reopen the report design.
5. Check the path of the included library to see if it is saved as a relative path.
